thread.title: A Year Later: The School System That Welcomed Unaccompanied Minors
thread.title_full: A Year Later: The School System That Welcomed Unaccompanied Minors

author: Lyzza
title: A Year Later: The School System That Welcomed Unaccompanied Minors
text: Posts: 1,399 A Year Later: The School System That Welcomed Unaccompanied Minors Yep, remember all those scary, scary unaccompanied minors that were streaming into the US? So scary and illegal. Yep. Here's a story about dealing with hundreds of them in schools in Oakland. Not so scary anymore. Not the criminals they were made out to be. In fact, they have survived some terrible experiences to reach this country. One boy interviewed said he wants to grow up to be a police officer, or a social worker to help other kids. So scary.
